message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds immense value and relevance to your needs, just like it does for me. Considering its worth and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. If you decide to proceed with the purchase, I would be more than happy to sell it to you for $14,500. This represents a significant saving compared to the market value, making it a fantastic deal for you. I trust that you will find this proposal attractive and look forward to your positive response.
